title: Brute Force (restored, with intro and outro) (1947, film noir, imdb score: 7.5)

sources.title: Brute Force 1947 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Brute Force (aka Zelle R 17 ) is a 1947 American crime film noir directed by Jules Dassin , from a screenplay by Richard Brooks with cinematography by William H. Daniels . It stars Burt Lancaster , Hume Cronyn , Charles Bickford and Yvonne De Carlo . This was among several noir films made by Dassin during the postwar period. The others were Thieves' Highway , Night and the City and The Naked City .
